caption.p: (A) Frequency distributions of the calculated range of MCWD (mm) across 2157 Amazon tree species' ranges with range sizes >300,000 km 2. (B) Difference in MCWD and straight‐line geographic distance between all possible pairs of 1278 regularly spaced‐points (points located at the center of each degree latitude/longitude) within the lowland Amazon forest. The red line represents the running median of differences in MCWD within a moving window of 200 km distances.
